definition[0]: a clear, very hard valuable stone, used in jewellery and in industry
definition[1]: a shape with four straight but sloping sides of equal length, with one point facing directly up and the other directly down
example[1]: Cut the cookie dough into diamonds.
definition[2]: one of the four suits (=types of cards) in a set of playing cards, which has the design of a red diamond shape on it
example[3]: You have to play a diamond.
definition[4]: the area in a baseball field that is within the diamond shape formed by the four bases
definition[5]: the whole playing field used in baseball
